description.value:
Trigger A living creature crosses the midpoint of the tunnel

Effect The dead reach out from the walls and ceiling, moaning and spewing writhing maggots. Creatures in the room must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save. The trap then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}. It can't reduce its frightened condition below 1 while in the trap's area.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] for 1 round.

details.description: When a living creature crosses the midpoint of the trapped tunnel, necromantic magic partially animates the corpses buried in the walls and ceiling.
details.disable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:24|name:Disrupt Magical Trigger|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to disrupt the magical trigger before the hazard rolls initiative, or @Check[type:religion|dc:18|name:Overwhelm the Area with Positive Energy] (trained) to overwhelm the area with positive energy and prevent the hazard from using its routine for 1 round; on the third successful Religion check, the necromantic energies are disrupted and the hazard is destroyed.
details.routine:
(1 action) Undead fists assail all creatures in the hall, dealing [[/r 4d6[bludgeoning]]] damage. Creatures in the hall must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:21].

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage, and its Speeds are reduced by 10 feet (to a minimum of 5 feet) for 1 round.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] for 1 round.
